Build a fort: Cut out windows and doors in the cardboard box and use it as a fort for kids to play in.
Make a storage unit: Cut out compartments in the cardboard box and use it as a storage unit for small items.
Create a DIY pet bed: Cut out a section of the cardboard box and use it as a cozy bed for pets.
Make a birdhouse: Cut out a small hole in the front of the cardboard box and use it as a birdhouse.
Create a bookshelf: Cut out shelves in the cardboard box and use it as a bookshelf.
